source_text: The exploration license, EL8492 (Tenement), covers an area of 2,375ha and is located near the town of Barraba, approximately 400km by road to the port of Newcastle and 550km north of Sydney. The project geology sits along the Peel Fault and encompasses the historic Gulf Creek and Murchison copper mines (see Figure 1).
additional_details: The coverage area refers to the exploration license (EL8492) which encompasses the Gulf Creek Project.
